original_text: They are all adulterers, as an oven heated by the baker, who ceaseth from raising after he hath kneaded the dough, until it be leavened.
korean_text: 그들은 다 간음하는 자라 과자 만드는 자에 의해 달궈진 화덕과 같도다 그가 반죽을 뭉침으로 발효되기까지만 불 일으키기를 그칠 뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: as an oven heated by the baker
sentences.korean_translation: 빵 굽는 자가 데운 화덕과 같으며

sentences.original_text: after he hath kneaded the dough
